descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone! This is my first \"big\" mod, is not that big but oh well :D

Im still learning tricks about the CK and i think this expansion is decent enought to be
posted here!

The Door is located behind the stairs inside Breezehome.

:::::::Whats New?::::::::::
This mod added 4 rooms to some type of basement, 1 of them is a meeting spot, another room with chests and Crafting Objects (Enchanting Table etc.) Another room for Armors exibition, a food storage room (theres ingredients already inside) and one guests room.
::::::::Important::::::::::::

For ENB users theres another file with bright lights if you think the original lights are not bright enought.

::::::Known Problems::::::::
Theres a mesh/texture missing, im working on this already hope i can fix it soon.
Thats the only problem so far.

Thanks to LittleBaron for the painting mesh
Bethesda for the creation kit and skyrim ofcourse :D
Caliente for giving me some tips in general
And the nexus for letting me be part of this community :)! 

Avaible only here! :D

Other mods:

Simple Breezehome enchanting table http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15280

::::::::

If you find any bugs or wanna give suggestions feel free to leave them at the comment section!
author: Darkdream
